title: Multi-Cloud Infrastructure Automation

title: Kubernetes Security Platform
description: Comprehensive security implementation for production Kubernetes clusters including RBAC policies, network policies, pod security standards, and automated compliance scanning across EKS and GKE.

title: Centralized Logging Pipeline
description: ELK stack implementation with custom log filtering, PII masking, and real-time alerting. Reduced log storage costs by 60% while maintaining security visibility across multiple cloud environments.

title: Wazuh SIEM Deployment
description: High-availability Wazuh SIEM stack integrating logs from Google Cloud, Cloudflare, and CrowdStrike. Implemented custom alerting rules, FIM, and incident response workflows for centralized security monitoring.

title: GitOps CI/CD Pipeline
description: Automated deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions and ArgoCD for continuous delivery to Kubernetes clusters. Implements automated testing, security scanning, and progressive rollout strategies.

title: Cloud NGFW Implementation
description: End-to-end deployment of Google Cloud Next Generation Firewall including firewall endpoints, security profiles, Layer 7 inspection, and threat prevention policies for enterprise-grade network security.
